titleStmt.title: The power of Congregational churches asserted and vindicated in answer to a treatise of Mr. J. Paget intituled The defence of church-government exercised in classes and synods / by John Davenport.
titleStmt.author: Davenport, John, 1597-1670.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Rich. Chiswell and to be sold by John Usher of Boston in New-England,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
